Notes: 
• We are able to track water usage only at seven facilities, 
which account for 69% of our real estate and recycling data is 
available only for the three campuses. 
• In FY21, water consumed in areas of water stress amounted to 
17,293 kiloliters (76% of total water consumed). 
• We started tracking water withdrawal by source only in FY20, 
so this breakdown is not available for previous years.
• The amount of paper recycled is greater than the amount used 
in FY21 as paper from FY20 was also recycled in FY21.
• There was a reduction in water used, water recycled, waste and 
waste recycled due to the work from home policies followed in
